short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Choose any image on the web as your desktop wallpaper (Windows only)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension requires the installation of Python and Native Messaging Host, which enable it to make changes to your computer. Download links and usage instructions are included in the options page.

Additional features:
Save recent wallpaper to your downloads
